meanings.sent1: The squid left behind an inky trail in the water.
meanings.sent2: Her inky hair shone in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The inky cat knocked over a bottle of ink.
meanings.sent4: The night sky was as inky as a deep ocean.
meanings.sent5: The inky clouds threatened a storm.

meanings.definition: Dark or black in color like ink.
meanings.sent1: The inky shadows crept along the wall.
meanings.sent2: The old castle was surrounded by inky forests.
meanings.sent3: The inky dress made her look like a mysterious figure.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were as inky as the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The inky night enveloped the city in darkness.
